Predicted candidates that overlap sRNAs identified using RNA‐Seq (Table 2) are shown in 
bold 
a

Numbering according to E. coli MG1655 (NC_000913.2 ) of left and right boundaries of 

sRNAs 
b
c

F, forward strand; R, reverse strand 

MEV, Mean Expression Value 

d
e

PRM, Percentage of Region Mapped 

Data from previous reports: 1, Rivas et al. 2001; 2, Chen et al. 2002; 3, Yachie et al. 

2006; 4, Tran et al. 2009.
